credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Herman Miller Summer Picnic, 1988
provenance: Acquired new and directly from designers, museums, and cultural institutions by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
medium: Silkscreen with lacquer finish on wove paper
description: On black background, lollipops in orange, yellow, red, green, violet randomly arranged; each lollipop stick is inscribed with a line from a popular song. Inscription at top left: "Herman Miller Summer Picnic 1988".
name: Poster
